com.netflix.governator.guice.jetty

Class GovernatorServletContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • GuiceContainer
      • com.netflix.governator.guice.jetty.GovernatorServletContainer

  • public final class GovernatorServletContainer
extends GuiceContainer
    Enhancement to GuiceContainer by allowing Jersey to be configured via bindings instead of statically in a JerseyServletModule. In addition all singleton resources will be instantiated eagerly. ```java bind(GuiceContainer.class).to(GovernatorServletContainer.class).asEagerSingleton(); ``` To set up a Jersey endpoint, ```java serve("/*").with(GuiceContainer.class); ``` To customize the configuration of the Jersey endpoint ```java
